results.message: LICENSE.txt is not needed in a skill — agents may load it into their context window, taking space from your actual task (Anthropic best practices: skills should only contain files that directly support agent functionality)
unexpected file at root: editing.md — if agents need this file, move it into references/ or assets/ as appropriate; otherwise remove it to avoid unnecessary context window usage
unexpected file at root: pptxgenjs.md — if agents need this file, move it into references/ or assets/ as appropriate; otherwise remove it to avoid unnecessary context window usage
description has 20 comma-separated segments, most very short — this looks like a keyword list; per the spec, the description should concisely describe what the skill does and when to use it
